description: This salad dressing recipe is bursting with zesty lemon, garlic and refreshing mint. Whip it up in a flash and add to your favourite salad.
keywords: Salad dressing,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lemon, Garlic & Herb Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch mint, leaves picked, finely chopped
2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Combine zest, juice, garlic and mint in a small glass jug or bowl. Add oil and whisk with a fork until combined. Season with pepper.
